ee ekkama menna eelanga sinduwa aawa.minisamayi lowa dewiyan wanneminisamayi lowa thirisan wanneethakotayi mata mitar wune eka digata mohidin beg ge sindu dekakma giya neda kiyala.eeka iwara wunu gaman menna eelanga sinduwa aawa.manikak rakina na rajindeku semama oba nirathuru rakimimohothak pasa nilmini kiyananamaya mathura kiyamieelangata dapu sinduwath mohidin beg ge ma ekak.anthimedi man bas eken bahala yana kotath mohidin beg ge parani rasangama witharayi rediyo eke pracharaya wune.
